DOC.brief_summary: This is a randomized pilot study of the use of cognitive behavior therapy versus observation to treat functional hypothalamic amenorrhea, often termed stress-induced anovulation.
DOC.detailed_description: The study enrollment was completed in 2003. The study results are being analyzed.
DOC.criteria: women with functional hypothalamic amenorrhea day awake / night asleep schedule eating disorders, depression, excessive exercise or any other cause of amenorrhea and anovulation other than functional hypothalamic amenorrhea weight loss greater than 10 pounds when amenorrhea developed running more than 10 miles per week or exercising more than 10 hours per week
